attributes.action: Launch a National Government Led Public Inquiry into the rape gangs scandal.
attributes.additional_details:
We Do Not trust Labour and the Local authorities, some of which are the same people who are still claiming that ethnicity, culture and religion have nothing to do with these crimes, or that it is wrong to bring them up, local led inquires will only be seen as a cover-up.

Children have been failed over and over again, and you are continuing to fail them, the survivors deserve the truth, justice and reassurance that this is not a cover up, this can only happen with a full National inquiry.
attributes.background: Government-backed local inquiries are simple not enough, we want a full transparent National Inquiry with powers to compel witnesses and access all required documents, investigation into the local government, police, CPS, and social services.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
